content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Another burner mining drill and stone furnace setup is not found, but there is another stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe groups (positions x=107.5, y=-34.5 and x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply.
- Regularly check the status of entities to avoid EntityStatus.NO_FUEL errors.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to function.
- Regularly check the status of entities to avoid EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS errors.

### Errors due to entities not being connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid.
- Regularly check the status of entities to avoid EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED errors.

### Errors due to entities not being plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network.
- Regularly check the status of entities to avoid EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK errors.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs. 
No important variables have been assigned.
